name: jc
params: wff w0, wff w1, wff w2

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wn(wi(w1, wn(w2))))
-| wi(w0, w1)
-| wi(w0, w2)
-| wi(w1, wi(w2, wn(wi(w1, wn(w2)))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wn(wi(w1, wn(w2))))
-| wi(w0, w1)
-| wi(w0, w2)
-| wi(w1, wi(w2, wn(wi(w1, wn(w2)))))

comment: Deduction joining the consequents of two premises. A deduction associated with ~ pm3.2im . (Contributed by NM, 28-Dec-1992.)
